fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Choose to attack or convert another player at night

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players will be dealt a basic attack at night if you choose
-Converted players will become a partygoer. There may only be 2 partygoers present at a time
-Players killed by a partygoer appear to be cake, because itâ€™s a party!
